Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the short cationic antimicrobial peptide family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli AB94012 (MIC>100 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa AB93066 (MIC>100 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus thuringiensis AB92037 (MIC=25 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis AB91021 (MIC=50 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus AB94004 (MIC=25 µg/ml), Methicillin-resistant coagulase-negative S. aureus (MIC=25 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Miscellaneous: Minimum inhibitory concentrations (MIC) for Mucroporin-1 analog are the following

Literature.Title: Comparative venom gland transcriptome analysis of the scorpion Lychas mucronatus reveals intraspecific toxic gene diversity and new venomous components.
Literature.Author: Ruiming Z, Yibao M, Yawen H, Zhiyong D, Yingliang W, Zhijian C, Wenxin L.

Literature.Title: Mucroporin, the first cationic host defense peptide from the venom of Lychas mucronatus.
Literature.Author: Dai C, Ma Y, Zhao Z, Zhao R, Wang Q, Wu Y, Cao Z, Li W.
